changesets.comments: mod: fixed command map icons not always displayed for spectator, fixes #469

journals.notes:
The same happens also on Windows, so this isn't only Linux related issue. Just to inform.

-*S

A few things:

* The bug seems to appear only if you are currently in the spectators team
* On brauendorf, only 2 dyna icons (on 3) don't display.

EDIT: This is a vanilla bug (2.60b/etmain). It happens when 2 map icons are located on the very same location (1 axis / 1 allies, such as a door and a dyna).

details.name: description
details.old_value:
On some popular maps, some icons don't appear on the command map and a yellow scare appears instead.
See the attached screenshot (Aldernest and Brauendorf). The Dynamite icon seems missing, but the issue might concerns other icons too.

This issue appears only in Legacy mod, the command map works fine in other mods.
details.new_value:
On some popular maps, some icons don't appear on the command map and a yellow scare appears instead.
See the attached screenshot (Aldernest and Brauendorf). The Dynamite icon seems missing, but the issue might concerns other icons too.

This issue appears in Legacy mod, the command map works fine in -other mods- Silent. ETpub is also affected.

subject: Command map icons not displayed
description:
On some popular maps, some icons don't appear on the command map and a yellow scare appears instead.
See the attached screenshot (Aldernest and Brauendorf). The Dynamite icon seems missing, but the issue might concerns other icons too.

This issue appears in Legacy mod, the command map works fine in -other mods- Silent. ETpub is also affected.
